description.value:
A Wailing Hammer of suspicous origins, wielded by various cult leaders or zealous military commanders. Its strikes driving those around into frenzies. Characters using the Hammer gain the Frenzy Talent and +5 to WS Tests for each other friendly character in 8 metres. Each of those allies suffer -5 to WS tests. The Hammer itself counts as a Best Craftsmanship Power Fist with Concussive (3) and Tearing Qualities. At the end of combat each friendly character within 8m suffers 1 Fatigue, and user suffers 1d5 Corruption for each adversary killed using the hammer.

Requirements

A Profane Object of Legend. It cannot be acquired, it must be earned or found.

Effect: Special

Notes: -
